short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI companion for any website you visit, plus tools to build and customize AI support for your own website and products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copalot AI Support

Copalot AI Support helps you boost your web productivity and build AI agents for both internal and user support, especially designed for small businesses.

Features
- Instant AI Assistance while browsing: Generate explanations, summaries, translations, and AI-powered images from any selected text on a webpage.
- Create your own AI chatbots with video FAQs using your own content.
- Deploy AI chatbots and video FAQs on your website and products to assist users 24/7

How to Use
- Select text on a webpage, then right-click or click the Copalot icon to receive real-time AI assistance.
- Explore additional AI tools for webpages and workspaces.
- Develop your custom ChatGPTs for both customer-facing and internal support.

Privacy-Focused
Your sensitive data is encrypted and securely stored.
We never sell or share your personal information.

Permissions
Access and modify data on websites you visit: Required for selecting text and integrating content into your AI.

Copalot AI Support helps you use AI effectively, boosting team productivity and building real-time user support for your business.

Try it now!
